message.entry: The index value should be greater than 0. To place an item as the first, set the index to 1.
The constructor does not support {0} input arguments. Use "help" command to find more information.
One or more input arguments for the constructor are not recognized. Use "help" command to find more information.

The "{0}" property accepts a valid callback data type. Valid callback types are: (1) a function handle; (2) a character vector; (3) a 1xN cell array where the first element is either a function handle or a character vector; or (4) [], representing no callback.
Use name/value pairs to specify property values.
The specified property name is not recognizable.
The specified property name "{0}" is ambiguous. Specify more characters for the property name.
"Tag" property accepts a character vector.
Cell array must contain character vectors only.
Specified data type is not supported.
Data array must be a vector.
The specified image file "{0}" cannot be located.
"Description" property accepts a character vector.
The image file must be in either PNG or JPG format.
The first input argument must be a PNG or JPG image filename or a CSS class name.
The first input argument must be a PNG or JPG image filename or a CSS class name. The second input argument must be a character vector that serves as the icon description.
Standard Toolstrip Icon: {0}
This is a custom CSS icon class: {0}
MATLAB Connector must run with local host.
MATLAB Connector failed to start.
The input argument must be a character vector.
The input argument must be a logical value.
ToolGroup cannot be launched because MATLAB was started with the -nojvm, -nodisplay or -noFigureWindows option or there is no display.
